comment: Many bugs fix bugs  pls
Thanks for the kind review!

title: Beutiful
comment: This calculator functions like a dream and covers all the bases for a phone calculator in a flat, simple, manner. I recommend this over any other calculator!

title: Wonderful
comment: Thank you please add percent key if possible
Google Now looking design

title: great
comment: application

title: . 2 means 0.2 please fix
comment: This is quite annoying. The calculator does not recognise that .x means 0.x
Brilliant!

title: Eye candy
comment: But functionality needed like in previous calculations cannot be viewed.

title: % missing
comment: It is a very imp calc function. Please add urgently . love the clean UI

title: Very close to being /sexy/, but just attractive for now...
comment: This app definitely looks great. But there are a few details that bother definitely bother me. The 'back' and clear buttons are completely out of place with the rest of the style. I would like to see these without the background color. The spacing on these seems really tight too compared to how the numbers are layed out. I also think the icon in the app looks quite cramped.

title: Not that intuitive
comment: 1 light themes too bright 2 entering *. (Multiply decimal) gives error, have to type 0 explicitly.

title: Works well.Neeeds %
comment: As it should. Looks great......bonus. It's a calculator.....and it's free.... What's not to like. Thanks to the developers.....some folk are never happy;)

title: not bad
comment: Simple and beautiful. Very nice app. Just I personally pefer a dark theme. Also I would like to see bigger result, back, and CE buttons. They look a little smaller to me now. Maybe it's just me though.

title: Please provide option to customise button size
comment: Can you please increase the size of delete and CE button? Or increase the space between them? Very often I would press the one when I want to press the other one.

title: Great App
comment: Ad free and clean look. Customizable color theme. Excellent,!

title: Very nice, very clean, BUT...
comment: It lacks a “%" button, digit grouping separators and a dark theme option. Also, in my Xperia ZL, opening the functions panel can be very frustrating because swiping up your finger from the bottom of the screen opens Google Now (I imagine many other phones have the same function) so, having the ability of opening it from the sides would be a MAYOR PLUS. Add these things and you'll get the 5 stars this app undoubtedly deserves as well as my donation/purchase.         Thanks.

title: Great
comment: Awesome calculator, props to the dev. Great work
perfect replacement app, thank you

title: Nice and clean
comment: Nice and clean app, but I wish there were more advanced functions like logaritm, deg/rad switch, e, 1/.. etc.

Thanks for your review.
There is a degree / radians switch in the settings and you can input for example 1/x by pressing x^-1. We are working on a logarithm function and hope that we'll be able to release it soon.
With kind regards,
JM Studios

title: nice
comment: very nice so clean and clear simple to use

title: Nice clean calculator
comment: Love the calculator, clean and simple to use.   I do wish there was a dark theme option.

title: fabulous app
comment: Simple and perfect
清新

title: Does not calculate correctly.
comment: Look nice but does not calculate correctly. E.g. 9*1,9=17.0999998 instead of correct answer 17.1.
Thanks for your feedback. The problem has been fixed and the update has been uploaded to the Google Play Store. It should be available in a few hours.

title: Slick
comment: Nice...and is open source too :) . Dark theme and history will make it even better if added/implemented.

title: Great look
comment: Get comma separators for the thousands and millions and you have a champion app.

title: Missing separator
comment: Looks nice but without thousand separator long number hard to read.

title: Useful
comment: Typing on a small screen can be tough but this app suits my phone perfectly.

title: Nice but needs fixing
comment: Edited: the new update fixed the issue and now this is the calculator app you should go for :-) more features are welcome  Request: one problem if sorted I'll be inclined to give 5 stars. The results show 8 to 10 decimal places. I think 3-4 decimal places is more than enough
Thanks for your feedback.

title: Clean & Elegant
comment: Beautiful spare looking with speedy easy to use calculations - nice set of minimalist theme colors to play with.
Needs history.

title: Nice
comment: Fast and clean and last update made it look even better on my nexus 7. Great job!

title: Great
comment: Clean simply superb

title: Nice calculator
comment: I like that you can swipe up to get extra features, and it looks cool.

title: Just for the looks
comment: It's not for me. Can't imagine a calculator without %, M  You could add that with a slide or something.  Want to uninstall but I will for some response for a while.
Thanks for your feedback. We are planning to add those features in the future, but it might take a while.

title: Good but
comment: It can have more features and be better

title: 界面干净无累赘
comment: 比原生好用

title: Excellent design
comment: But where is the percentage button
Very good UI but its giving wrong answers like sin (30)=-0.9888, very irritating.
This is actually the right answer, because Clean Calculator Beta calculates in radians and not in degrees: sin(30 radians) = 0.988.

title: Pretty good
comment: The UI is mind blowing.  Waiting to see future updates

title: Finally, a beautiful calculator app!
comment: I find all the other calculator apps on android ugly, but this one stands out from the crowd.  The interface is clean and beautiful. It's also funcional!

title: Good looking
comment: Never had problems with it and the UI is pretty nice.

title: Force close FIXED
comment: Back to being a beautiful app. Thanks!
Sorry for the inconvenience. We have published an update to fix it, which should be available in a few hours. Thanks for your feedback!

title: Just what I was looking for
comment: Thank you! I hated the stock calculator for a bunch of reasons, and most of the replacement ones were horrendously ugly. I don't particularly need advanced features, but I appreciate well designed apps - looking forward to seeing it come out of beta.

title: Good
comment: Good calculator for sure, very clean!

title: Great looking app, but...
comment: Been looking for this type of calculator app for awhile, something to replace my Nexus 4 stock calculator and yet still fit in with the phone's other stock Android apps. Please add a comma as a separator for hundreds, thousands, millions, etc. Also please lose the decimal on all numbers (example: 10 instead of 10.0). Also please take off your app logo from the calc screen so it looks more stock.

title: Awesome Design
comment: Guys, you have done a fantastic job with the design of the calculator.. As a user i would like 2 small changes--- 1) there should be atleast 2 lines of numbers- 1 for input, another for output. Right now, the output looks a bit messy for fractions. 2) to give a google now feeling to the calculator, it would be great if you could make the scientific functions swipable to left or right, instead of up and down..  Again, to say you have done a fantastic job is an understatement, this is one of the most stable beta apps i have seen

title: Add %
comment: Mailed you guys about it too btw.
We are working on it. It's a little hard to implement in the current calculation engine.

title: Thanks.
comment: Thank you si much for a clean calculator app! Keep up the good work!

title: Needs more features
comment: I loved the app.. It's design was great but it certainly needs more features like support for angles in degrees as well as in radians and also inverse trigonometric functions and also support for x^n
Thanks for your feedback. We have just added support for x ^ n, asin, acos and atan. We have also added parentheses, modulus and we have completely rebuild our calculation engine.

title: Clear, nice looking app
comment: Very nice and clear calculator.  Crashes on multiply action 'bin'
Thanks for the feedback. The bug you mentioned has been fixed.

title: Passable.
comment: Bad typesetting, bad grammar everywhere, bad theme, bad calculator layout. I like the idea but this just isn't handled well at all. Needs serious redesign work.

title: Clean free beautiful
comment: Oh and open source to boot :)

title: Nice
comment: Loved the color scheme  very clean  More features could be handy :)) I Figured that . More features as in like in stock calculator as in graph and all :))

Glad you liked it!
But I just wanted you to know that if you swipe up from the bottom, you get all the advanced functions like sin, cos, tan, bin, dec, sqr rt, x^2 and x^3.

title: Nice design...not sure on that turquoise though.
comment: For a simple, minimal look...it's nice.  Functional, it could use a M, M+, M-, and CM bar (adding digits to memory).  Maybe include color options and a full screen mode would make it about perfect.  Try the Holo Blue...it looks better.

Thanks for the feedback! We have implemented different themes, including a holo blue theme in the update.
We have also added a copy & paste function.
We are working on extra functions like M, M+, M- and memory.﻿
